member.name: IAppxContentGroup.GetFiles
member.summary: Gets files from a content group.
member.param: An enumerator for getting content group files.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxContentGroup.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the content group.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxContentGroup
member.summary: Retrieves information about a content group.
